name: 高立人
objective:
To understand the analysis, design, and simplification concepts and processes for combinational and sequential circuits. The following topics will be introduced.
1.Number systems：Commonly used number systems, and transformations between number systems.
2.Boolean Algebra：To understand how is Boolean algebra manipulated, and to introduce some basic logic gates.
3.Boolean Algebra Simplication：To introduce some simplication methods.
4.Combinational Logic：To introduce the analysis and design methods for combinational logic circuits.
5.Programmable Logic Array：To introduce the design method of PLA，PAL, and FPGA.
6.Flip Flop：To introduce commonly used Flip-Flops and their properties.
7.Synchronous and Asynchronous Sequential Logic：To introduce the analysis and design method for synchronous or asynchronous logic circuits.
8.VHDL：The well-known and commonly used Very High-speed Description Language.
schedule:
Ch1 Basic Principles of Digital Systems（Week1~2）
Ch2 Logic Functions and Gates（Week3）
Ch3 Boolean Algebra and Combinational Logic（Week4~5）
Ch4 Introduction to PLDs and Quartus II（Week6）
Ch5 Introduction to VHDL（Week7）
Ch6 Combinational Logic Functions（Week8，Week10）
Ch7 Digital Arithmetic and Arithmetic Circuits（Week11~12）
Ch8 Introduction to Sequential Logic（Week13）
Ch9 Counters and Shift Registers（Week14~15）
Ch10 State Machine Design（Week16）
Ch11 Logic Gate Circuitry（Week17）
